product_name: Patagonia Better Sweater Quarter-Zip Pullover - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The cozy Patagonia Better Sweater Quarter-Zip for boys withstands hard outdoor play and is warm and loungable at the same time. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight; sweater-knit face looks like wool. Stand-up collar and quarter-length front zipper with windflap allow ventilation and easy on and off. Stretch binding trims the cuffs, hem and collar edges of the boys' Patagonia Better Sweater. Zip chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The cozy Patagonia Better Sweater Quarter-Zip for boys withstands hard outdoor play and is warm and loungable at the same time.
